Today is the last day of Amazon Prime Day, which means Amazon Prime members have access to some pretty crazy deals right now on various products, but most notable are some huge discounts on Apple products. If you don’t have a Prime membership, you can sign up for a free trial of Amazon Prime or if you’re eligible for a Prime for Young Adults (18-24) membership, and gain access to these great prices while they last.

Let’s check out some of the deals remaining, from AirPods to Apple Watch to iPad and MacBook AIr:

AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $149 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 have all the bells and whistles of standard AirPods but with some amazing advanced features too, including FDA approved hearing aid functionality for mild to moderate hearing loss, high fidelity sound, active noise cancellation, water resistance and sweat resistance, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, ear detection, Siri support, and a USB-C charging case.

  • AirPods Pro 2 – $149 (down from $249)

AirPods 4 – $89 (down from $129)

AirPods 4 are deeply discounted from Apple’s retail price, coming in at just $89. AirPods 4 have the iconic design of the most popular wireless earbuds out there, and have great features like gesture support, spatial audio, voice isolation, water and sweat resistance, Siri support, and USB-C charging.

  • Get AirPods 4 for $89 (down from $129)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $279 (down from $399) & Apple Watch Ultra 2 for $650 (down from $799)

Apple Watch Series 10 has an always-on 42mm display, fitness and activity tracking capabilities, heart rate monitor, ECG with irregular heart beat detection, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support for one handed operation, water resistance, voice control, Siri commands, all-day battery life, and more. Why pay full retail when you can save a bunch from Amazon? And if you want even more features with a beefier Apple Watch, check out the killer deal on Apple Watch Ultra 2.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $279 (down from $399 MSRP)
  • Apple Watch Ultra 2 for $650 (down from $799)

iPad mini – $379 (down from $499)

iPad mini 7 features the A17 processor with Apple Intelligence support, 8″ LCD display, a 12mp front and rear camera, 128 GB storage, USB-C charging, and support for optional Apple Pencil Pro. You can get iPad Mini 7 in multiple color options at a great discount:

  • iPad mini 7 – $379 (down from $499)

M3 iPad Air 11″ and 13″ – $120 Off

M3 iPad Air has a Liquid Retina LCD display in 11″ and 13″ models, the M3 chip with Apple Intelligence support, 128GB base storage, 12MP front and rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, great battery life, support for Apple Pencil Pro and Apple Magic Keyboard for iPad Air, and is available at great discounts from Amazon.

  • M3 iPad Air 11″ – $479 (down from $599 retail)
  • M3 iPad Air 13″ – $679 (down from $799)

You can also get the base model iPad with A16 chip for just $279 right now if you want a simpler iPad and don’t care about Apple Intelligence support and future proofing for quite as long.

M4 MacBook Air – from $849

Amazon continues to offer incredible deals on M4 Macbook Air models, stating at $849 for the 16GB/256GB base 13″ model in various color options, but there are great deals on every screen size and configuration option.

  • 13″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 256GB for $849 (MSRP: $999)
  • 13″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 512GB for $1,099 (MSRP: $1,199)
  • 13″ M4 MacBook Air 24GB / 512GB for $1,299 (MSRP: $1,399)
  • 15″ M4 MacBook Air 24GB / 512GB for $1,449 (MSRP: $1,599)
  • 15″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 256GB for $1,099 (MSRP: $1,199)
  • 15″ M4 MacBook Air 16GB / 512GB for $1,299 (MSRP: $1,399)

AirTags 4-pack – $65 (down from $99)

AirTags are powerful simple to use trackers with Find My support, so you can track your luggage, purse, a backpack, briefcase, package, luggage, cat or dog, bicycle, scooter, car, or anything else you want to keep an eye on.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $65 (down from $99)
